item.title: [Python] [For beginners] Neural network super introduction that can be understood even by cats
item.description: ![IMG_0489.png](https://qiita-image-store.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/0/458623/93e891ee-1dc8-fa4e-7bb5-5a1922ffe589.png) Written What is a neural network? a unit? weight? bias? Activation function Overview of NN Summary The goal is to get a general idea of the neural network. I don’t use mathematical formulas, so people who are allergic to mathematics should also check it. #1.What is a neural network? A neural network is something like the one below. When written in English, it is Neural Network, so it is often abbreviated as NN.

item.title: [Python] Transform a real ferocious crocodile image into a 100 crocodile-smiling neural style with Keras
item.description: #What is neural style conversion? Neural style conversion is one of the machine learning techniques that transforms a target image into the style (texture) of another image to generate a new image. It’s a technology used in apps that change Van Gogh’s image of a city or people. Now, let’s try using this technology to see if this time we can transform a real, ferocious crocodile image that seems to eat humans into a gentle crocodile crocodile by transforming its style into a crocodile style that will die 100 days later.

item.title: [Python] [Super introduction] Machine learning using Python-From environment construction to simple perceptron implementation-
item.description: # First of all This article is from the 7th day of the DMM WEBCAMP Advent Calendar. This time it’s a super introduction, so I created it for those who have never tried machine learning but want to start **. The purpose is to get a rough idea of machine learning and try to implement a basic simple perceptron for the time being, so I’ve written a lot about the explanation of machine learning etc.
